import React from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import ava01 from "../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg"; import ava02 from "../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg"; import ava03 from "../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg"; const Testimonial = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 1000, slidesToShow: 3, swipeToSlide: true, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true } }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, } } ] }; return

John Doe

Customer

 } export default Testimonial;
